para: Comments begin with a sharp sign # and go till the end of the line. Space, tabulation, and line-break characters are not significant.

section.title: Tokens
section.para: There are two composite operators /\ (AND) and -> (IMPL), and one keyword in (IN).

Numbers are either written with a binary representation {integer}([bB][-+]?{integer})?, or with a decimal representation (({integer}(\.{integer}?)?)|(\.{integer}))([eE][-+]?{integer})?. In both representations, the {integer} parts are radix-10 natural numbers.

section.title: Grammar
section.programlisting:
$accept: BLOB $end
BLOB: PROG '{' PROP '}' REWRITE
PROP: ATOM | '(' PROP ')' | PROP AND PROP | PROP IMPL PROP
SNUMBER: NUMBER | '+' NUMBER | '-' NUMBER
INTERVAL: '[' SNUMBER ',' SNUMBER ']' | '?'
ATOM: REAL IN INTERVAL
ROUNDING: '<' IDENT '>'
EQUAL: '=' | ROUNDING '='
PROG: /* empty */ | PROG IDENT EQUAL REAL ';'
REAL: NUMBER | IDENT | IDENT '(' OPERANDS ')' | ROUNDING '(' REAL ')' | REAL '+' REAL | REAL '-' REAL | REAL '*' REAL | REAL '/' REAL | '(' REAL ')' | '+' REAL | '-' REAL
OPERANDS: REAL | OPERANDS ',' REAL
REWRITE: /* empty */ | REWRITE REAL IMPL REAL ';' | REWRITE REAL '$' REAL ';'
